DOC.brief_summary: HPV infection prominent among college-aged woman . Although HPV vaccine decrease woman 's risk cervical cancer , vaccination rate remain inadequate . This study explore utility Information-Motivation-Behavioral Skills intervention promote HPV vaccination knowledge , motivation , behavioral skill among college age woman .
DOC.brief_title: An Information-Motivation-Behavioral Skills ( IMB ) Intervention Promote Human Papillomavirus Vaccination Among Women
DOC.detailed_description: HPV infection prominent among college-aged woman . Although HPV vaccine decrease woman 's risk cervical cancer , vaccination rate remain inadequate . This study explore utility Information-Motivation-Behavioral Skills intervention promote HPV vaccination knowledge , motivation , behavioral skill among college age woman . Methods : Participants randomly assign single-session intervention attention-control arm assess pre-intervention , post-intervention , 1-month follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Enrollment psychology course University Connecticut Completion HPV vaccination series
